name: Felipe Parra
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: I am a results-driven Software Developer with over 5 years of experience in developing, implementing, and maintaining web applications across various industries, specialized on JavaScript as a Full Stack Developer. I also harness the power of Python to create robust solutions. I am proficient in modern web technologies such as React, Vue, Node, Express, Django, Flask, Firebase, and MongoDB. My proven track record of delivering high-quality applications from conception to launch, streamlining functionality, and optimizing user experience positions me as an expert in the field.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Led the development of Payment component using MercadoPago, OpenPay & SR Pago, using React JS.
Optimized the performance of the Payments component, reducing the load time from 9 seconds to 1.6 seconds by implementing pre-rendering, component splitting and deferred loading techniques.
Implemented Datadog RUM for real-time user monitoring, enhancing application performance insights at Frontend projects.
Designed and implemented scalable RESTful APIs with .NET Core and SQL Server, ensuring high performance and security.

experience.title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
responsibilities: Added support and use of Sumsub KYC on existing platform with NestJS, SQS, MongoDB.
Created a proof of concept to understand the operation and requirements for implementation with VueJS and SumSub.
Led the team responsible for giving the general vision of the operation of the KYC.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack JavaScript Developer
responsibilities: Led the development of a web app using React JS, Firebase, and other technologies, while ensuring code quality through linters and Husky.

Enhanced user experience by updating the landing page for app downloads and creating multilingual support for the company's website and a tailored health concierge solution in the hospitality industry.
Contributed to the development of new features for a React Native mobile app.
Integrated internal APIs for improving interoperability, including a Proxy to handle external providers using Python’s Flask.

experience.title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
responsibilities: Worked on maintenance and development of new features backend platforms using Node, Express, Axios, Cors, Passport, and Nodemailer.
Implemented new features, including a Landing page with VueJS, Nuxt, Vuex and new form fields for the Angular dashboard.
Collaborated on a joint project with Netflix, handling orders and data migration using Python and Django.

experience.title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
responsibilities: Developed a web service using Node, Express, Axios, Cors, Passport, and Nodemailer.
Developed a web app with NextJS, React, Redux, React-Intl, and Sass.
Worked on development components such as user sign-up, order tracking, and product details for an international e-commerce website.

experience.title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
responsibilities: Built and launched an application for managing orders, deliveries, prescriptions, and an online store.
Developed the backend using Node, Express, MongoDB, and Mongoose.
Started development of an e-commerce platform using ReactJS and Firebase.

experience.title: Point of Sale Manager & Database Administrator
responsibilities: Worked with MySQL and SQLite, developing scripts for usage and sales statistics using Python, Java, and JavaScript.
Provided technical support for Points of Sale.
Handled installation, updates, backups, and database support using SQL Server, Python, and Java.
